name: WebGLRenderingContext.validateProgram
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.validateProgram() method of the WebGL API validates a WebGLProgram. It checks if it is successfully linked and if it can be used in the current WebGL state.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'validateProgram' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glValidateProgram' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
